name: Radiant Media Player
description: A cross-device HTML5-first video player for today's web. Live, DVR and on-demand video in a snap. Stream to HTML5 video with HLS for desktop and mobile devices. Discover our advanced video ads solution: ad scheduling, ad-block detection, video ads API and more. We also support MPEG-DASH, DRM, AMP, advanced analytics and the player comes with a fully-featured, unified Flash fallback with HLS support.
